titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the rate of the excise tax on certain wooden arrows designed for use by children.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4797)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
5/22/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the excise tax on bows and arrows certain shafts consisting of all natural wood which after assembly measure 5/16 of an inch or less in diameter and which are not suitable for use with bows that would otherwise be subject to such tax (having a peak draw weight of 30 pounds or more).
